message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn! How about a slight adjustment for a more even split? Think of the long game Alice.
Come on, Bob, I'm being generous despite the inflation!

Alice, it's clear we both want to maximize our gains. Let's stop wasting time with the back and forth. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  Don't let inflation eat away at our potential winnings!
